comments.content:
hellenic wide...   
   
er, maybe not. The W is off

FF Zapata would get you close, but it's not an exact match.   
   
 [http://www.fontfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123332/http:/www.fontfont.com/)

58 Rodeo is closer than Zapata, but still not an exact match:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/regular/testdrive.html?s=POSTER+SHOW&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/regular/testdrive.html?s=POSTER%2BSHOW&p=48)
It's close, but not identical, to Baseline's [58 Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/regular/?s=POSTER%20SHOW)
